类的使用
Physics.Vector

  • 使用Vector的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    Object  
    Physics  

    • Object中Vector的使用

      声明为Vector的Object中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected Vector Object.Acceleration 
      private Vector ExternalLoad.Drag 
      private Vector Aircraft.Drag 
      private Vector Aircraft.Friction 
      private Vector GunBullet.Gravity 
      private Vector ExternalLoad.Gravity 
      private Vector Aircraft.Gravity
      attributes of an aircraft cd and cl is the drag coefficient and lift coefficient, used to calculate drag and lift Friction is used to brake on the groud G is the load factor of the aircraft, G = Lift/Gravity Mach and IAS is another two method to show speed Performance stored detailed performance of an aircraft PylonIndexList stored the drag index of every ExternalLoad
      private Vector ExternalLoad.Lift 
      private Vector Aircraft.Lift 
      private Vector ExternalLoad.Thrust 
      private Vector Aircraft.Thrust 
      protected Vector Object.totalForce 
      protected Vector Object.Velocity 
      返回Vector的Object中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Vector Object.getAcceleration() 
      Vector ExternalLoad.getDrag()
      calculate the total drag
      Vector Aircraft.getDrag()
      calculate the total drag
      Vector Aircraft.getFriction() 
      Vector GunBullet.getGravity()
      Get gravity of this bullet
      Vector ExternalLoad.getGravity()
      Get gravity
      Vector Aircraft.getGravity()
      Get gravity of this aircraft
      Vector ExternalLoad.getLift()
      Get Lift, the direction of the lift is defined by the GuideCondition, and if GuideCcondition is 0, keep level flight
      Vector Aircraft.getLift()
      calculate the lift
      Vector ExternalLoad.getThrust()
      get the thrust of the externalLoad It has one or two Stage of Rocket Engine, there will be no thrust after these two stage burn out
      Vector Aircraft.getThrust()
      get the thrust according to engine, throttle and life
      Vector Object.getTotalForce()
      these special getters also contain the formula to get this value
      Vector Object.getVelocity() 
      参数类型为Vector的Object中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Object.setVelocity(Vector velocity) 
      参数类型为Vector的Object中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Aircraft(java.lang.String name, double x, double y, Vector Velocity, double FuelPercentage, int Throttle, int Signature, ControlLogic Player, java.lang.String LoadChoice)
      Constructor of this aircraft load the parameters of five sub systems from xml file set start consition include speed, location, fuel and throttle

    • Physics中Vector的使用

      返回Vector的Physics中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Vector Vector.getReverseVector()
      get vector reversed
      Vector Vector.vectorAdd(Vector A)
      define the add of two vector
      Vector Vector.vectorTime(double a)
      define the result of vector times a value
      参数类型为Vector的Physics中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      double Vector.getAngle(Vector v)
      get the angle between two vector
      Vector Vector.vectorAdd(Vector A)
      define the add of two vector
      java.lang.Double Vector.vectorMult(Vector A)
      define the Multplication of of two vector
